ECF-R.BK.long_name: East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited
ECF-R.BK.summary: East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited manufactures and sells self-assembled furniture in Thailand. The company manufactures, trades in, and distributes furniture made of particleboard and rubber wood under the ELEGA, Finna House, a7, Hasta, Costa, My Fur, VV DÃ©cor, FREELAX, and Leaf brand names, as well as dried rubber wood. It also manufactures and distributes foil paper, which is used in coating the particleboard and sawn timber, as well as offers edge-cutting service of (PVC) to be used in furniture assembly. The company distributes its furniture through showroom, wholesale shops, and retail shops, as well sells furniture online. In addition, it operates biomass and solar power plants. The company also exports its products to Japan, the United States, the Middle East, China, India, Malaysia, the Philippines, and other countries. East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

FANCY-R.BK.long_name: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited
FANCY-R.BK.summary: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells wood furniture and rubber wood products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers particle board, modified rubber wood, and services related to rubber wood. It is also involved in real estate development activities, as well as rental of property. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

FANCY.BK.long_name: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited

The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

HPT-R.BK.summary: Home Pottery Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells fine China tableware in Thailand. The company offers its products and accessories for hotels and restaurants. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lampang, Thailand.

HPT.BK.summary: Home Pottery Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells fine China tableware in Thailand. The company offers its products and accessories for hotels and restaurants. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lampang, Thailand.

ILM-R.BK.long_name: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
ILM-R.BK.summary: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of furniture, electronic, and home decorative products in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Retail of Furniture, Manufacturing of Furniture, Rental Area, and Others. It is also involved in the manufacture, import, export, and distribution of furniture and home appliances; and building and warehouse rental activities, as well as in the franchise business. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited sells its products through 36 branches, as well as online. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tummada Panich Family Co., Ltd.

KOOL-R.BK.summary: Masterkool International Public Company Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies alternative cooling products to corporate, industrial, or home users under the MASTERKOOL and COOL TOP brands in Thailand and China. It offers evaporative air coolers, misting fans, centrifugal force fans, and industrial and ventilation fans; and ozone generators. The company also engages in the rental of equipment, systems, and related products, such as evaporative air coolers, high pressure systems, drink machines, air conditioners, umbrellas, tables, chairs, fog machines, and tents. In addition, it offers after sales and other services. The company serves various markets, such as animal farms, companies-factories-warehouses, events, hotels and resorts, places of worship, public transport, residences, restaurants, schools, sport arenas, and tourism places through dealers. It also exports its products to approximately 34 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Masterkool International Company Limited and changed its name to Masterkool International Public Company Limited in September 2014. Masterkool International Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OGC-R.BK.summary: Ocean Glass Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells table glassware in Thailand and internationally. It offers a range of glasses, such as water, iced beverage, whiskey, beer, wine, coffee and tea, and dining glasses, as well as storage jars and handy packs. The company offers its products under the Ocean and Lucaris brand names. It serves food service, retail, and B2B markets through distributors in approximately 90 countries. Ocean Glass Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ROCK-R.BK.summary: Rockworth Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and markets office systems furniture in Thailand and rest of Asia. Its products include de-mountable, interior wall, and full height storage systems; workstations; tables and training systems; executive systems; and filing and storage systems. The company also provides lighting products and mounted accessories, as well as seating and lounges products, including chairs, sofas, and seating products. It serves clients in automobile, consumer product, educational institution, financial institution, insurance, government, real estate and property, logistic, petrochemical, media, telecommunication, and others markets through a network of dealers. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIAM-R.BK.long_name: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited
SIAM-R.BK.summary: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel office equipment and furniture, and furniture parts in Thailand. The company is also involved in construction business. Its steel and wooden furniture products include cabinets, lockers, and combine furniture systems; desks and tables; chairs; partitions; safes; shelving systems; and furniture for stadiums comprising bleachers and folding stages. In addition, the company provides prefabricated building systems that consist of permanent buildings, which includes accommodation unit for oil and gas industry, mining camp, business hotel, convenience store, show, etc.; temporary building, which includes mobile office, mobile clinic, kiosk, mobile toilet, etc.; and storage building, which consists emergency shelter, telecom shelter, warehouse units, soundproof rooms, etc. Further, it offers special products, such as flood protection panel and related products, bathroom pods, smart wall systems, earthquake and seismic retrofits, bulletproof security products, and steel structure solutions, as well as building materials, such as doors, staircases, etc. It also invests in solar plants and alternative energy; and manufactures and distributes solar equipment. The company offers its products under the Lucky, Kingdom, Flowork, Okamura, Chitose, Siamsteel, ITO, and Pilot brand names. Siam Steel International Public Company Limited was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.
